message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm initially asking for $15,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product is worth more to you. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to go above $10,000. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
